7222.title: There is a date of the last update of the privacy policy

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms
tosdr.tldr: The privacy policy was last updated on July 16, 2018. The terms of service does not provide a date.

7224.quoteText:
To make our website better, we use Google Analytics (GA) to see how many people are visiting it.
We have set GA to use the minimum available retention period and not store IP addresses.
7224.title: TunnelBear uses third-party cookies for statistics

tosdr.case: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics
tosdr.tldr: TunnelBear uses Google Analytics to "see how many people are visiting [their website]". They have set it to use the minimum available retention period and not store IP addresses.

7225.quoteText:
We may send data to third-party service providers who operate services that help us with: customer support.
email.
hosting, protecting, and securing the TunnelBear infrastructure.
DDoS prevention.
payment processing.
as well as understanding website analytics, account and payment related service usage.
7225.title: Your personal data is given to third parties

tosdr.case: Your personal data is given to third parties
tosdr.tldr: TunnelBear may send data to third parties for "customer support; email; hosting, protecting, and securing the TunnelBear infrastructure; DDoS prevention; payment processing; as well as understanding website analytics, account and payment related service usage".

7226.quoteText:
We store your Personal Data only as long as is necessary for the purposes for which it is collected, to provide our Services, resolve disputes, establish legal defenses, conduct audits, pursue legitimate business purposes, enforce our agreements, and comply with applicable laws.
We erase or destroy the records containing Personal Data when they are no longer required.
this will be done in ways that will ensure your continued privacy.
7226.title: TunnelBear's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

tosdr.case: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
tosdr.tldr: The privacy policy states that they "store your Personal Data only as long as is necessary for the purposes for which it is collected, to provide our Services, resolve disputes, establish legal defenses, conduct audits, pursue legitimate business purposes, enforce our agreements, and comply with applicable laws" and that they  "erase or destroy the records containing Personal Data when they are no longer required; this will be done in ways that will ensure your continued privacy".

7232.quoteText:
TunnelBear Inc.
(“TunnelBear”) reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to modify or replace the terms of this Agreement at any time.
If the alterations constitute a material change, TunnelBear will notify you by posting an announcement on the TunnelBear website.
What constitutes a material change will be determined at TunnelBear’s sole discretion.
You shall be responsible for reviewing and becoming familiar with any such modifications.
Using our Services following notification of a material change to this Agreement shall constitute your acceptance of the Agreement as modified.
7232.title: Terms and privacy policy may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
tosdr.tldr: Using TunnelBear after the privacy policy or terms have changed means that you have accepted them. TunnelBear will notify you if they have changed by posting an announcement on their website and you are responsible for reviewing the modifications.

7257.quoteText:
The Service is provided by TunnelBear on and “as is” “as available” basis without warranties of any kind, either expressed or implied, including without limitation, any implied warranty of metchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of third-party rights, are hereby disclaimed to the maximum extent permitted by law.
You expressly agree that use of the Services is at your sole risk.
7257.title: TunnelBear is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

tosdr.case: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
tosdr.tldr: The terms of service state that "The Service is provided by TunnelBear on and [sic] "as is" "as available" basis without warranties of any kind" and that "[y]ou expressly agree that use of the Services is at your sole risk."

7260.quoteText: Notwithstanding the foregoing, in no event shall the total liability of TunnelBear, for all damages, losses and causes of action whether in contract, tort including negligence, or otherwise, exceed the aggregate dollar amount paid by the User claimant to TunnelBear in the twelve months prior to the claimed loss, damages or other such alleged event giving rise to the basis of claim.
7260.title: Any liability on behalf of TunnelBear is only limited to the fees you paid as a user in the twelve months prior to the claim

tosdr.case: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
tosdr.tldr: The terms of conditions states that any liability will not exceed the "aggregate dollar amount paid by the User claimant to TunnelBear in the twelve months prior to the claimed loss, damages or other such alleged event giving rise to the basis of claim".

7263.quoteText: You hereby expressly and irrevocably release and forever discharge TunnelBear, its affiliated and associated companies, and their respective directors, officers, employees, agents, representatives, independent and dependent contractors, licensees, successors and assigns of and from any and all actions, causes of action, suits, proceedings, liability, debts, judgments, claims and demands whatsoever in law or equity which you ever had, now have, or hereafter can, shall or may have, for or by reason of, or arising directly or indirectly out of your use of the Services.
7263.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of TunnelBear

tosdr.case: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
tosdr.tldr: The terms of service states: "You hereby expressly and irrevocably release and forever discharge TunnelBear, its affiliated and associated companies, and their respective directors, officers, employees, agents, representatives, independent and dependent contractors, licensees, successors and assigns of and from any and all actions, causes of action, suits, proceedings, liability, debts, judgments, claims and demands whatsoever in law or equity which you ever had, now have, or hereafter can, shall or may have, for or by reason of, or arising directly or indirectly out of your use of the Services. You hereby agree to indemnify and hold harmless TunnelBear, its affiliated and associated companies, and their respective directors, officers, employees, agents, representatives, independent and dependent contractors, licensees, successors and assigns from and against all claims, losses, expenses, damages and costs (including, but not limited to, direct, incidental, consequential, exemplary and indirect damages), and reasonable attorneys’ fees, resulting from or arising out of (i) a breach of this Agreement, (ii) the use of the Services, by You or any person using your account, or (iii) any violation of any rights of a third party."
